column4: How can I make it so that highlight copies everywhere and middle click is paste?
well, with x there is the regular clipboard and then that is a secondary one already
explain more, what you said doesn't help me with my problem.  So there are two clipboards you say?

thats the way I read about it, but a bit of trying here in xchat seems to imply that they use the same clipboard area... fore xample ... just select some text right now and middle click in the input box... it gets copied alright
